Text: Absolution (also known as The Mercenary: Absolution) is a 2015 action crime film directed by Keoni Waxman and starring Steven Seagal. The film is a sequel to "A Good Man", and is the sixth collaboration between Steven Seagal and director Keoni Waxman.
